channel.title: Help On My 317
channel.description: Well I was Wondering How to change exp rates for my server If someone helped id appreciate it :)

item.title: Help On My 317
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Ok go in client.java and searchâ€¦

double TotalExp = 0;

under it you should see

if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(2000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(1700*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(1500*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(1300*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;

its kinda self explanitory but change the number before the * to your exp rate

Read full topic
